citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:30 pm on
28-Jun-17. The inspector knocked on the facility door, called the provided contact number, and sat in the driveway
for 30 minutes attempting to contact the license holder. All attempts were unsuccessful.
A responsible person shall be available to conduct an inspection during business hours.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:30 pm on
28-Jun-17.  The inspector knocked on the facility door, called the provided contact number, and sat in the driveway
for 30 minutes attempting to contact the license holder.  All attempts were unsuccessful.
A responsible person shall be available to conduct an inspection during business hours.
